contextId.information: The phrase "these days" refers to the time while Zechariah was serving in the temple. It is possible to state more clearly what this refers to. AT: "After Zechariah returned home from his temple service" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_newevent]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
